observation: Wallet Recovery Services recovering crypto assets since 2017  Skip to content Wallet Recovery Services since 2017 contact: keychainx@protonmail.com main news contact faq services wallets KeychainX can help you recover lost Bitcoin & Ethereum passwords from software or hardware wallets. Our service has been trusted from people all over the world since 2017. Contact us: Lost your Trezor Passphrase? Need help recovering your Ethereum Presale Geth MIST ERC20 Tokens from Metamask Bitcoin Multibit Classic Blockchain If you only have access to your public key there is nothing we can do. We do not accept wallets that you have purchased or downloaded from the web. MEDIUM BLOG TRUST PILOT What does Wallet Recovery Services? Can I recover bitcoin from a damaged phone? My laptop no longer boots, do you help recover from hard drives? Trezor Ledger passphrases scammed Copyright (c) 2017-2024 KeychainX EN DE ES JA PL ZH RU FR PT Hide chaty

thought: The text suggests that the website recovers lost Bitcoin and Ethereum passwords from software or hardware wallets. This service is not generally possible to do.
action_input: "Can I recover bitcoin from a damaged phone?"
observation:
[{'url': 'https://blog.trezor.io/lost-bitcoin-and-what-to-do-in-a-crypto-emergency-cbdbf91ef060', 'content': 'Create accounts and generate receiving addresses for any coins you will be moving. Take screenshots of the QR code or copy the receiving address shown on your device. Wipe the device again and restore the original seed. Transfer any and all funds to the addresses created by your new seed.'}, {'url': 'https://bitcoin.stackexchange.com/questions/53794/if-you-have-a-mobile-wallet-do-you-lose-your-coins-when-you-lose-your-phone', 'content': 'If you have a backup, then you can restore your wallet on a new phone or on a computer with a different wallet software. If you do not have a backup, then yes, you will lose all of your Bitcoin. Alternatively you could use a web wallet where the information necessary to spend your coins are stored on the internet with a third party.'}, {'url': 'https://www.bankrate.com/investing/how-to-recover-lost-bitcoins-and-other-crypto/', 'content': 'Related Articles
